entry.title: A Diamond in the making
entry.summary:
Author: michellekoilover

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,277Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 543

Summary: Stiles went away after that night, leaving everything behind, his family, his home.Everyone looked at him like a murderer, a traitor with blood stained hands.He was going to prove himself a worthy ally, irreplaceable, supportive. Anything -but- a damn murderer.or...Stiles decides he wants to take the killer tag associated to his name and become the best support and healer the supernatural has ever seen.

entry.title: After Everything
entry.summary:
Author: pixieblade

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,600Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 83

Summary: After everything Scott and the others had done, after everything he’d endured, he didn’t know why he was here. What he should have done was put gas in the Camaro and gotten the hell out of Beacon Hills. Instead, he’s standing on the sidewalk in front of the Stilinski’s house trying to figure out what the hell was wrong with him.

entry.title: To Build A Life
entry.summary:
Author: SeaKell2004

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,018Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 21

entry.title: Casus Belli
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,681Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 117

Summary: “I’m supposed to take care of you,” Derek started.“Shut up,” Stiles stated with no heat. He looked up at Derek. “When are you going to get it that I like taking care of you too?”Derek weakly shook his head. “I’m not good enough, Stiles.”Stiles’ features sunk. “Don’t I get to decide that?” He stood, dropping the towel he had been using to help move the blanket. “Just… get in bed, Derek. We can talk later.”Derek remembered touching Stiles’ wrist. “I should have died that night we met.”“Not when I have anything to do with it,” Stiles replied.~*~The one where "touch him and die" is a promise both Derek and Stiles live by

entry.title: Stolen Bonds
entry.summary:
Author: Warner_Azer_BBG

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,753Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Derek Hale is looking for his mate, when he gets a call from his sister, but when he finds her, he sees a dead body of the one last sibling he had left, but he found who he was originally looking for.Stiles has been having terrifying dreams or visions, for over a month of a creature, that kills innocent people, and he can tell the creature wants something from him, but it’s not what he expects.Scott has been worried about his best friend, but one night he goes into the woods and gets bitten by a wolf, but he didn’t know that. He doesn’t understand what is going on with him or his best friend.Peter Hale had bitten Scott in the woods not long ago, but he found someone much more interesting. Stiles Stilinski. Peter figures out that Stiles is Derek’s mate, but what he didn’t expect was that Stiles was his mate as well. This changes Peter’s whole path of his plan. His goal is to now, make Stiles his mate before Derek even gets the chance. No matter the consequences.

entry.title: LIKE THE COMING OF SPRING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,959Chapters: 34/36Kudos: 4

Summary: Three months after leaving to attend Berkeley, Stiles receives a phone call. Twelve years later; Stiles and Derek's son, Eli, is eager to help when a new enemy emerges. The nemeton has been quieted, but things never remain silent forever. When a demonic force threatens the peace in Beacon Hills, the Hale pack must prove that they are stronger than ever.Or;You are in the backyard, lying in the grass. The sun is high and hot. The light is painting the darkness behind your eyes into a vermillion. “You know what you have to do, right?” Laura asks. Last you saw she was filling a wading pool, but the water has stopped running through the hose and as she moves you can hear it sloshing around her shins.“No clue,” you answer. Laura laughs. You've missed that sound so much, and it makes you think about how long it took you after your family died to laugh again. “Last time we spoke you said my grief was too quiet… but it's been a while since I lost anyone.”You hear the water slosh two more times as she steps out of the pool. She walks over to you and stands so close to your arm that you can feel how cold the water is from her feet.“Who says grief must be fresh to be felt?”

entry.title: Lollipop Lanes
entry.summary:
Author: LolliKitty34

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,148Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 10

Summary: It had been a year since Allison Argent, best friend of Lydia Martin and beloved girlfriend of Scott McCall died. And a year since Stiles broke up with Malia and had to endure the Nogitsune’s torturous head games. A lot can happen in a year. Like going to another mental health facility. One that actually helped. And a rather…unlikely person that helped him come out as gay, have a whirlwind romance with and quickly become engaged and then married to a year later. Derek. Derek Hale was his everything. And now their next step was looking for a home together. His PTSD was still acting up as they toured apartments, but Derek will stop at nothing to put a permanent smile on his new husband's face. When a once in a life time opportunity comes up, an add for an apartment above a blank space that used to be a book store….Well…Time will tell if books are really a cure for everything. *ongoing fic*

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 112,666Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 92

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: Generations of Time
entry.summary:
Author: Blossomingcoral

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,970Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 138

Summary: “I don’t think saying your name is going to get any of us killed son. But if it would make you feel better you don’t have to tell us.” John laid an encouraging hand on the teen’s shoulder.“Well then, hi I’m Eli. I’m Eli Hale.” There were a few gasps and a thud causing Derek to turn and see Stiles passed out in the dirt.Typical.
